messages.content: Comfyui_MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator is a custom node in ComfyUI that can automatically generate image labels or prompts for running lora or dreambooth training on flux series models using the fine-tuned model MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator.
What is the base model used for fine-tuning MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator?
The base model used for fine-tuning MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator is the int4 quantized version of MiniCPM-V 2.6.
How was the MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator model trained?
The MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator model was trained on a Midjourney prompt dataset containing more than 3000 samples of images and prompts sourced from Midjourney, using 2x 4090 24GB GPUs.
What are the three main functionalities of Comfyui_MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator?
The three main functionalities of Comfyui_MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator are: 1) Single-Image Caption, 2) Short prompt generate, and 3) Long prompt generate.
How can users perform batch image captioning using Comfyui_MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator?

For batch image captioning, users can indicate the image folder path, and the system will read all images in the folder and generate captions for each image, saving them as text files with the same name as the image file.
What are the installation methods for Comfyui_MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator?

Comfyui_MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator can be installed either through the ComfyUI Manager by searching for 'MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator' or by downloading or cloning the repository into the 'ComfyUI\custom_nodes\' directory and running 'pip install -r requirements.txt'.
How can users download the MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator model manually?
Users can download the MiniCPMv2_6-prompt-generator model manually by following the link provided in the documentation.
